name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Aerodynamics
lessons.description: An overview of the fundamental concepts in aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Fluid Dynamics Principles
lessons.description: Basic principles of fluid dynamics as applied to aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Aerodynamic Forces
lessons.description: Understanding the forces acting on an object moving through the air.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Introduction to Subsonic Flow
lessons.description: Basics of subsonic flow and its characteristics.

lessons.name: Introduction to Supersonic Flow
lessons.description: Fundamentals of supersonic flow and its unique properties.

lessons.name: Comparative Analysis of Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
lessons.description: A comparative study of subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Basics of Aerodynamic Heating
lessons.description: Introduction to the principles of aerodynamic heating.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Overview of thermal protection systems used in aerospace applications.

lessons.name: Materials for Thermal Protection
lessons.description: Study of materials used in thermal protection systems and their properties.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Introduction to Spacecraft Structures
lessons.description: Basics of spacecraft structural design and the challenges involved.

lessons.name: Materials Selection for Spacecraft
lessons.description: Criteria and processes for selecting materials for spacecraft structures.

lessons.name: Structural Analysis Techniques
lessons.description: Techniques and tools for analyzing spacecraft structures.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Fundamentals of Orbital Mechanics
lessons.description: Basic principles and equations governing orbital mechanics.

lessons.name: Orbital Maneuvers
lessons.description: Techniques for performing orbital maneuvers and changes.

lessons.name: Mission Planning
lessons.description: Planning and executing space missions with a focus on orbital dynamics.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Introduction to Spacecraft Systems
lessons.description: Overview of the various systems that make up a spacecraft.

lessons.name: Subsystems Engineering
lessons.description: Detailed look into the subsystems of a spacecraft and their functions.

lessons.name: Integration and Testing
lessons.description: Processes for integrating and testing spacecraft systems.

name: Organic Chemistry I
description: Introduction to the principles and reactions of organic chemistry.

lessons.name: Introduction to Organic Chemistry
lessons.description: Basic concepts and history of organic chemistry.

lessons.name: Hydrocarbons
lessons.description: Study of the structure, properties, and reactions of hydrocarbons.

lessons.name: Functional Groups
lessons.description: Overview of different functional groups in organic molecules and their reactions.

name: Organic Chemistry II
description: Detailed study of organic reactions and mechanisms.

lessons.name: Organic Reaction Mechanisms
lessons.description: In-depth analysis of various organic reaction mechanisms.

lessons.name: Stereochemistry
lessons.description: Understanding the spatial arrangement of atoms in organic molecules.

lessons.name: Organic Synthesis
lessons.description: Principles and strategies for the synthesis of organic compounds.

name: Advanced Organic Chemistry
description: Advanced topics in organic chemistry and applications.

lessons.name: Advanced Organic Reactions
lessons.description: Study of advanced organic reactions and their applications.

lessons.name: Bioorganic Chemistry
lessons.description: Intersection of organic chemistry and biochemistry.

lessons.name: Medicinal Chemistry
lessons.description: Application of organic chemistry principles in drug discovery and development.

name: Fundamentals of Inorganic Chemistry
description: Introduction to the principles and concepts of inorganic chemistry.

lessons.name: Introduction to Inorganic Chemistry
lessons.description: Basic concepts and history of inorganic chemistry.

lessons.name: Periodic Table and Atomic Structure
lessons.description: Study of the periodic table, atomic structure, and periodic properties.

lessons.name: Chemical Bonding
lessons.description: Overview of ionic, covalent, and metallic bonding in inorganic compounds.

name: Intermediate Inorganic Chemistry
description: Advanced concepts and applications in inorganic chemistry.

lessons.name: Coordination Chemistry
lessons.description: Study of coordination compounds and their properties.

lessons.name: Transition Metals
lessons.description: In-depth look at the chemistry of transition metals and their complexes.

lessons.name: Organometallic Chemistry
lessons.description: Introduction to organometallic compounds and their applications.

name: Advanced Inorganic Chemistry
description: Advanced topics and current research in inorganic chemistry.

lessons.name: Bioinorganic Chemistry
lessons.description: Exploration of the role of metals in biological systems.

lessons.name: Solid State Chemistry
lessons.description: Study of the structure, properties, and applications of solid materials.

lessons.name: Inorganic Reaction Mechanisms
lessons.description: Understanding the mechanisms of reactions involving inorganic compounds.

name: Fundamentals of Physical Chemistry
description: Introduction to the principles and concepts of physical chemistry.

lessons.name: Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Basic principles of thermodynamics and their applications in chemistry.

lessons.name: Chemical Kinetics
lessons.description: Study of the rates of chemical reactions and factors affecting them.

lessons.name: Quantum Chemistry
lessons.description: Introduction to quantum mechanics and its applications in chemistry.

name: Intermediate Physical Chemistry
description: Advanced concepts and applications in physical chemistry.

lessons.name: Statistical Mechanics
lessons.description: Principles of statistical mechanics and their use in physical chemistry.

lessons.name: Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Study of the interaction of electromagnetic radiation with matter.

lessons.name: Electrochemistry
lessons.description: Fundamentals of electrochemistry and its applications.

name: Advanced Physical Chemistry
description: Advanced topics and current research in physical chemistry.

lessons.name: Advanced Quantum Chemistry
lessons.description: In-depth study of quantum chemistry principles and methods.

lessons.name: Surface Chemistry
lessons.description: Study of chemical processes at surfaces and interfaces.

lessons.name: Computational Chemistry
lessons.description: Introduction to computational methods used in physical chemistry.
